CHOW Chian- chiu (ZHOU Qianqiu, 1910- 2006) and CHOW LEUNG Chen- ying (ZHOU LIANG Can- ying, 1921- 2005)  
Kingfisher and Lotus 1983 Hanging scroll, ink and colour on paper, 148 x 70.5 cm Gift of the artists HKU.P1983.0868  
This work by Chow Chian- chiu and Chow Leung Chen- ying was painted by the couple in October of 1983 and presented to UMAG to coincide with an exhibition of their work, Painting by Chow Chian- chiu and Chow Leung Chen- ying. Chen- ying painted the lotus leaves and flower using the 'boreless method, without guiding outlines. The kingfisher and dragonfly were added by her husband, Chian- chiu, to enliven the painting. UMAG showed a number of their collaborative works in another exhibition entitled Lasting Fragrance: Chinese Ink Painting by Chow Chian- chiu and Chow Leung Chen- ying, April- June 2014, including this painting.
